price: “Mee wantoota samiileefi dachii keessa jiran (hunda) ilaalaa” jedhi. Mallattooleefi akeekkachiiftonni namoota hin amanne irraa homaa hin deebisanu.
arabic: قُلِ ٱنظُرُواْ مَاذَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَا تُغۡنِي ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ وَٱلنُّذُرُ عَن قَوۡمٖ لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: quli unẓurū mādhā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā tugh'nī al-āyātu wal-nudhuru ʿan qawmin lā yu'minūna
